Description: 2003 Epiphone G400 antique ivory SG with gold hardware. Back of guitar has some buckle rash as it was used to gig for a number of years. The bridge hardware has normal wear from playing, but I will include replacement parts if desired. This guitar is a classic neck thru design and is solid as a rock! With the Grover tuners I’ve never had any issue with tuning stability and the the action is set low. No bowing in the neck and truss rod works very smooth. I will include a black locking strap, and the original epiphone hard case I purchased with it. The case has a little wear on the outside but works perfectly. This guitar plays and sounds better than my gibson les Paul’s and SG’s and was half the price!
